entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
